website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Xperia Z3 is Sony's most formidable to date with a formidable display and promising features that easily give Android competition from HTC, LG and Samsung a run for their money.
pros: The Sony Xperia Z3 packs great battery life, a brilliant display, beautiful design and waterproof features
If you own a PS4, you'll also be able to play PS4 games remotely on your phone
cons: The UI can use updating -- all the icons just look way too big
While it may have a 20.7-megapixel camera, autofocus can be a little off, but nothing a quick tap on the screen can't fix

The only problem is Sony: the company makes no warranty for the phone, since the products are not made in Brazil - absurd, since Sony is a global brand, such as apple and samsung. customer_reviews.title: FISH!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable phone and great for documenting your adventure. If you travels and into outdoor activity then you'll need a reliable phone to document your life adventures. This phone has great hardware and software support to handle all the exciting lifestyle there is. With mico-sd expansion slot you'll never run out of storage. I was hesitant at first but the phone performed wonderfully underwater and I was able to get great shot while snorkeling in hawaii.

customer_reviews.title: NO SONY FACTORY WARRANTY...BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE.....Sony advises me there is no warranty on these phones purchased from Amazon. If you need warranty service, you will pay big-time if you send it to SONY for repairs. The phone itself is a great phone...it has the highest of high-end specs and performs flawlessly....until something breaks or it needs service, then you are S.O.L. If you want a good strong warranty, get the phone from a seller that can back it up, like SONY, T-Mobile or Sprint. These are the only authorized U.S. sellers of this phone, and they can provide an excellent warranty.
customer_reviews.author: art

product_meta.title: Sony XPERIA Z3 D6653 4G LTE (FACTORY UNLOCKED) (Silver Green) - International Version No Warranty
product_meta.description: 2G Network GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 3G Network HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1700 / 1900 / 2100 4G Network LTE 700 / 850 / 900 / 1800 / 2100 / 2600 Please make sure to check with your phone carrier for frequency compatibility issue before you order.
feature_bullets: 20.7 MP, 5248 х 3936 pixels, autofocus, LED flash
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
